long_description: Consider it your security blanket for unpredictable weather-our featherweight Novara Stowable bike jacket is so comfortable and quiet, you'll forget you have it on! Recycled ripstop polyester fabric is tough enough to endure the daily grind; fabric is breathable, water resistant and windproof to 50 mph. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. 2 rear zippered pockets tote your cycling essentials and food; left pocket is slightly larger than right. Jacket is, well, stowable! Stuffs conveniently into its own rear pocket and then easily fits in your jersey pocket. Soft elastic binding at waist and neck keeps out wind and water. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Novara Stowable bike jacket has reflective detailing to increase visibility to motorists.
